statements: SELECT * FROM road_closures;
SELECT id, closure_date, start_time, end_time, reason, detour_description FROM road_closures;
SELECT id, closure_date, reason FROM road_closures WHERE closure_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM road_closures WHERE reason LIKE '%accident%';
SELECT id, closure_date, start_time, end_time, reason FROM road_closures ORDER BY closure_date DESC, start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM road_closures ORDER BY closure_date DESC, start_time ASC, end_time DESC, id;
SELECT reason, detour_description FROM road_closures WHERE closure_date = '2022-10-15' AND start_time >= '09:00:00' ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT id, closure_date, reason FROM road_closures WHERE reason LIKE '%construction%' OR detour_description LIKE '%road%' ORDER BY closure_date DESC;
SELECT id, closure_date, detour_description FROM road_closures WHERE start_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00' ORDER BY closure_date ASC;
SELECT id, closure_date, start_time, end_time, detour_description FROM road_closures WHERE closure_date BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-10-31' ORDER BY closure_date DESC, id ASC;
SELECT * FROM road_closures;
SELECT road_name, closure_start_date FROM road_closures WHERE road_id = 1;
SELECT detour_name, end_location FROM detours WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM detours ORDER BY detour_id DESC;
SELECT road_name AS name, closure_end_date AS end_date FROM road_closures WHERE closure_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM road_closures WHERE closure_start_date >= '2022-08-01' AND closure_end_date <= '2022-08-31';
SELECT road_name, closure_end_date FROM road_closures WHERE road_id = 5;
SELECT detour_name, start_location, end_location FROM detours WHERE is_active = TRUE ORDER BY detour_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM road_closures JOIN detours ON road_closures.road_id = detours.detour_id WHERE road_name LIKE 'A%' AND is_active = TRUE;
SELECT road_closures.road_name, detours.detour_name FROM road_closures, detours WHERE road_closures.road_id = detours.detour_id;
SELECT * FROM road_closures ORDER BY closure_id DESC;
SELECT closure_name, start_date, end_date FROM road_closures WHERE closure_id = 1;
SELECT detour_name, distance_km, duration_hours FROM detours WHERE duration_hours > 3;
SELECT route_name, start_point, end_point FROM routes WHERE road_closure_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM road_closures JOIN routes ON road_closures.closure_id = routes.road_closure_id;
SELECT * FROM road_closures WHERE closure_id = 1;
SELECT closure_name, start_date, end_date FROM road_closures WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT closure_name, description FROM road_closures WHERE description LIKE '%traffic%' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT route_name, start_point, end_point, detours.distance_km FROM routes INNER JOIN detours ON routes.detour_id = detours.detour_id WHERE routes.route_id = 1;

SELECT route_name, start_point, end_point, closures.start_date, detours.duration_hours FROM routes INNER JOIN road_closures AS closures ON routes.road_closure_id = closures.closure_id INNER JOIN detours ON routes.detour_id = detours.detour_id WHERE closures.start_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY detours.duration_hours DESC;
SELECT * FROM road_closures;
SELECT closure_id, road_name, closure_reason FROM road_closures WHERE closure_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT agency_name, agency_location, contact_person FROM agencies WHERE agency_location = 'New York';
SELECT detour_name, start_location, end_location FROM detours ORDER BY detour_distance DESC;
SELECT route_id, road_id, detour_id, planning_date FROM route_planning WHERE planning_notes IS NOT NULL;
SELECT road_name, closure_start_date, closure_end_date FROM road_closures WHERE closure_reason = 'Road Construction'
SELECT detour_name, start_location, end_location, detour_distance FROM detours ORDER BY detour_distance DESC
SELECT * FROM route_planning WHERE planning_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT agency_name, agency_location, contact_person, contact_number FROM agencies WHERE agency_location = 'New York'
SELECT road_name, closure_start_date, closure_end_date, closure_reason FROM road_closures WHERE closure_start_date < '2022-05-01' ORDER BY closure_start_date ASC
SELECT * FROM road_closures;
SELECT road_name, closure_start, closure_end FROM road_closures;
SELECT detour_road_name, detour_start FROM detours WHERE id = 1;
SELECT agency_name, contact_phone FROM traffic_agencies WHERE id = 2;
SELECT route_name, route_start, route_end FROM planned_routes ORDER BY route_start DESC;
SELECT * FROM road_closures WHERE closure_start < '2022-10-01'
SELECT road_name, closure_start, closure_end FROM road_closures ORDER BY closure_end DESC
SELECT road_name, closure_start, closure_end FROM road_closures WHERE road_name = 'Main Street'
SELECT detour_road_name, detour_start, detour_end FROM detours WHERE detour_start > '2022-09-01' ORDER BY detour_start ASC
SELECT * FROM planned_routes WHERE route_start > '2022-10-15' AND route_end < '2022-12-31'
